title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed internal tools using technologies like Nest.js, Postgres, Prisma, React, Gatsby.js, and styled-components. I also created careers.zeptolab.com to improve the hiring process. Currently, I'm working on tools using TypeScript, React, Redux, GraphQL, Nest.js, Material UI, and Chakra UI to enhance team productivity. I excel in delivering high-quality, scalable solutions while collaborating with cross-functional teams. I stay updated with industry trends and prioritize continuous learning to drive innovation and success.

title: Player XP Team Lead
description: Built and led high-performing teams, consistently delivering exceptional player experiences. I aligned team goals with business objectives and industry best practices, effectively communicated clear goals, conducted annual reviews, and cultivated a high-performance culture. I closely monitored day-to-day operations to ensure timely and high-quality service delivery, mentored new team members to drive overall success, and implemented technology and automation solutions that led to cost savings and enhanced player satisfaction. Throughout, I fostered positive relationships, encouraged innovation, teamwork, and a commitment to continuous improvement.

title: Project Manager
description: Led the ChatBot project to enhance Customer Support productivity and implemented a machine learning tool for Google Play reviews, resulting in a 66% increase in processed reviews. Additionally, I coordinated development projects for plarium.com across teams, managed project timelines within budget, gathered project requirements from stakeholders, and established optimized work schedules using agile methodologies. I also collaborated with internal associates and departments and generated productivity reports to guide decision-making.

title: Community Management Lead
description: Assisted the director in leading and managing a team of 53 members, emphasizing collaboration and teamwork. I enhanced team processes, resulting in increased productivity, efficiency, and customer satisfaction. I also played a role in developing and implementing strategic plans for departmental growth and success. In addition, I set and communicated both short-term and long-term team goals to foster a high-performance culture. I ensured that teams had the necessary technical resources and tools for delivering high-quality services. Lastly, I provided regular reports and analyses on departmental performance to support data-driven decision-making.

title: Senior CS Team Lead
description: Led and coached three Team Leads, fostering a culture of excellence and collaboration. I analyzed data to identify strategies for enhancing service and productivity, and successfully implemented improvements. Additionally, I introduced a new help desk system and internal tools, resulting in improved efficiency and customer satisfaction. Furthermore, I integrated the help desk system into multiple game titles, enabling instant support for players. To increase team productivity and reduce workload, I automated routine tasks. Lastly, I established a knowledge base to decrease ticket volume and improve response times.

title: Customer Support Team Lead
description: Led and managed a team of 20 customer service agents, fostering excellence and teamwork. I efficiently planned work tasks, conducted staff evaluations, and developed training programs to maintain high standards. I implemented policies and resolved escalated issues, ensuring customer satisfaction and loyalty.
